name: Space Sucks
description:
This was the first game ever made by me!

WASD to move around, and space bar to shoot.
This game is essentially a protype platformer,  everything except for the door/keycard system and audio was made by myself from scratch using Unreal Engine 4.
It is unfinished, as there was no real end in mind for the project.

It was made as a part of a group project:

Doors + keycard system + audio: https://github.com/Crazyhand94

Grade: Upper Second-Class Honours, 2:1
